add_sound.title: Add Sound
add_sound.prompt_placeholder: Describe the sound atmosphere, sound effects or desired music (e.g.: 'light wind and birds singing', 'epic music and explosion sounds', 'horse gallop on ground')...
add_sound.processing_time: Adding sound may take a few minutes.

errors.invalid_source: Source video is not loaded or is invalid.
errors.missing_prompt: Please enter a description for the sound.
errors.no_video_selected: No video selected. Please choose a video from the gallery.

add_sound.success: Sound addition has been started. Processing may take several minutes.

how_it_works.title: How it works
how_it_works.step1_desc: The page loads the video you selected.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Use a prompt to describe the audio to add to the video.
how_it_works.step3_desc: The generation of the new video with sound is started and may take a few minutes.

scribble.title: Scribble Playground
scribble.description: Generate detailed images from your sketches.
scribble.prompt_placeholder: Describe the image you want to generate from your drawing (e.g. 'a colorful landscape with mountains and a lake', 'a realistic portrait of a woman with long hair')...
scribble.complete_info: Complete the information and click Generate Image

errors.invalid_source: Please select a valid source drawing first.
errors.missing_prompt: Please enter a prompt describing the desired image.
errors.general: The generation failed or did not return an image.

variation.title: Image Variation
variation.description: Create variations of your existing images.
variation.prompt_placeholder: Describe the modification you want to make to the image (e.g. 'Transform this image into cartoon style', 'Add a cat next to the subject')...
variation.complete_info: Complete the prompt and click Modify Image to generate a variation

errors.invalid_source: Please select a source image first.
errors.missing_prompt: Please enter a prompt describing the desired modification.
errors.general: The generation failed or did not return an image.

image2video.title: Video Generation
image2video.description: Turn your images into animated videos.
image2video.prompt_placeholder: Describe the video you want to generate...
image2video.mobile_message: The complete interface is available on desktop
image2video.success_message: Video generation has been successfully started. Processing may take several minutes.

how_it_works.title: How it works
how_it_works.step1_desc: Choose a generated image from your gallery as a starting point.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Use a descriptive prompt to guide the video generation.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Generation is started in the background and can take 3-5 minutes. You will receive a notification.

errors.invalid_source: Please select a source image first.
errors.missing_prompt: Please enter a description for the video.

create_image.title: Create Image
create_image.description: Create an image using a text prompt.
create_image.prompt: Enter a text prompt to generate an image.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Your creations and generated images.
gallery.no_drawings: You don't have any saved drawings yet.
gallery.no_generated_images: You haven't generated any content yet.
gallery.no_videos: No public videos available at the moment.
gallery.login_required: Sign in to view your drawings.

metadata.title: yatubbb
metadata.description: Makes it easy to create and share AI-generated images and videos. You can create images from text, edit them, and even generate videos from images. The platform is user-friendly and offers a variety of tools to enhance your creative process.
